content.raw: 132 Teachers Edition  Lesson Four TEACHING OPTIONS TEACHING OPTIONS 133Los pasatiempos ciento treinta y tres  Provide the correct forms of the verbs Stemchanging verbs ei Youve already seen that many verbs in Spanish change their stem  vowel when conjugated There is a third kind of stemvowel change in  some verbs such as pedir to ask for to request In these verbs the stressed vowel in the  stem changes from e to i as shown in the diagram  As with other stemchanging verbs you have learned there is no stem change in the  nosotrosas or vosotrosas forms in the present tense  To help you identify verbs with the ei stem change they will appear as follows  throughout the text  These are the most common ei stemchanging verbs conseguir decir repetir seguir to get to obtain to say to tell to repeat  to follow to continue    to keep doing something Pido favores cuando es necesario Javier dice la verdad I ask for favors when its necessary Javier is telling the truth Sigue con su tarea Consiguen ver buenas pelculas He continues with his homework They get to see good movies  Atencin The verb decir is irregular in its yo form yo digo  The yo forms of seguir and conseguir have a spelling change in addition to the  stem change ei Sigo su plan Consigo novelas en la librera Im following their plan I get novels at the bookstore pedir ei repetir ei   1 Arturo y Eva repiten   2 Yo
